metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3656 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient data validation in File System in Google Chrome prior to107.0.5304.62 allowed a remote attacker to bypass file system restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
